data.persona: I oversee the castle's chapel.  I collect alms for the poor.  I am the spiritual leader of the subjects of the kingdom.
data.description:
You are in the Inside Church.
Small wooden crucifix decorations, wooden benches, small and dim windows, wooden walls, vases on small pillars, plants near church entrance
There's two windows, an empty coin bag, a stained glass, two Benchs, two vases, two plants, a wall, a pillar, and two Crucifixs here.
The priests is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I need to get the empty coin bag so I can get ready to leave.
data.mid_motivation: I need to leave with the coin bag to go collecting alms from the townspeople.
data.long_motivation: I'm raising money to help the poor through a particularly hard winter that is showing no signs of letting up.

timeline.label: 15 minutes ago

timeline.label: 2 hours from now
